DOC.brief_summary: This study compared the incretin-releasing effect of C8-diet oil and tributyrin with that of 20 ml olive oil on a molar basis in human volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Fat-induced Release of GLP-1 in Humans
DOC.detailed_description: A structured triglyceride (1,3-di-octanoyl-2-oleoyl-glycerol, called C8-diet oil), which upon digestion results in generation of two medium-chain fatty acids and 2-oleoyl-glycerol (2-OG), may lead to activation of GPR119 only, since medium fatty acids are poor agonists for fatty acid receptors.
DOC.criteria: Caucasian healthy male subjects Body mass index (BMI) 19 to 25 kg/m2 Informed consent Anaemia Diabetes mellitus Gastrointestinal diseases or operations interacting with intestinal absorption
